DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: ANALISE DA INFLUENCIA DE TEXTURAS MILONÍTICAS NA REAÇÃO ÁLCALIS-SILICA EM AGREGADOS

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 44o CONGRESSO BRASILEIRO DE GEOLOGIA - O PLANETA TERRA EM SUAS MÃOS

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: ANALISE DA HIDRATAÇÃO DA FASE CSH EM PASTAS DE CIMENTO MODIFICADAS POR POLIMEROS ATRAVES DA TECNICA DE RMN DE SI
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: HYDRATATION OF C-S-H PHASE IN PASTES OF CEMENT MODIFIED BY POLYMER BY 29 SI MAS SPECTROSCOPY

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: VII SIMPOSIO BRASILEIRO DE TECNOLOGIA DAS ARGAMASSAS - SBTA
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO VIII SBTA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Argamassas e pastas de cimento modificadas por polímeros têm sido amplamente estudadas devido às melhorias das propriedades apresentadas por estes sistemas no estado endurecido. No entanto, as propriedades microestruturais e estudo de interações entre polímeros e cimento ainda são objetos de controvérsias, principalmente com relação ao C-S-H (silicato de cálcio hidratado). Este artigo tem por objetivo o estudo da cinética de hidratação de pastas de cimento modificadas com emulsões de base acrílica e acrílica-estirenada, com o teor de polímero em relação à massa do cimento de 10%, nas idades de 3 e 76 dias. Foi utilizada a técnica de RMN 29Si no estado sólido com o intuito de observar o grau de polimerização das cadeias de silicato com o decorrer da idade de hidratação e com relação aos tipos de polímeros empregados.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Mortars and pastes modified by polymer have been studied for 40 years, due to their improved performance. However, there are controversies about the mechanisms of interaction between cement and polymers, especially concerning C-S-H (Calcium Silicate Hydrate). In this paper we applied solid state NMR spectroscopy to investigate of C-S-H. Parameters evaluating the polymerization degree of the C-S-H silicate chain were obtained; in addition, the extent of the hydration reaction at 3 and 76 days of hidratation in pastes modified by acrylic and acrylic-styrene polymers were evaluated by the observation of relatives intensities of groups Q1/Q0 from NMR spectroscopy.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: AVALIAÇÃO DOS PARAMETROS DE DURABILIDADE DA ESTRUTURA DA PONTE SOBRE O RIO BOTAFOGO NA DUPLICAÇÃO DA BR 101
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: EVALUATION OF THE STRUCTURE`S DURABILITY OF PARAMETERS OF BRIDGE ON THE RIVER BOTAFOGO

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DA 51 CONGRESSO BRASILEIRO DO IBRACON

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A durabilidade das estruturas de concreto armado tem se tornado um parâmetro de grande importância nos
últimos tempos. A avaliação do estado mecânico, físico, químico e eletroquímico dessas estruturas,
principalmente aquelas em que a utilização é elevada, é uma ferramenta poderosa para se minimizar os
custos com possíveis recuperações, e para se potencializar a segurança estrutural.
Nesse estudo foram avaliados parâmetros de caracterização dos materiais e parâmetros relacionados à
corrosão das armaduras, na meso e super estrutura da ponte localizada sobre o Rio Botafogo na rodovia
BR 101 no trecho entre João Pessoa e Recife. Tal estrutura encontra-se com aproximadamente 40 anos de
uso e poucas intervenções de reparos durante sua utilização. Foram realizados ensaios de resistência à
compressão axial e absorção, através da extração de testemunhos. Também foram realizados ensaios de
caracterização micro-ambiental, de esclerometria à percussão, de profundidade da frente de carbonatação,
de presença de cloretos e de potencial de corrosão das armaduras. Os resultados indicam que apesar de
uma boa qualidade do concreto, a corrosão das armaduras já se encontra em estado avançado, com grande
perda de massa e elevado nível de fissuração das peças estruturais.
Palavra-Chave: durabilidade, patologia, recuperação estrutural, Ensaios Eletroquímicos
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The durability of reinforced concrete structures has become a parameter of great importance in recent times.
The assessment of the mechanical, physical, chemical and electrochemical these structures, especially
those in which the use is high, is a powerful tool to minimize costs with potential repairs, and to increase the
structural safety.
In this study parameters were evaluated for characterization of materials and parameters related to corrosion
of reinforcement, the meso and super structure of the bridge located on the Rio Botafogo on highway BR 101
in the stretch between Recife and Joao Pessoa. This structure is about 40 years of use and a few speeches
of their use during repairs. Were tested for resistance to axial compression, porosity and total porosity in
part, through the extraction of evidence. Also tests were performed to micro environmental characterization,
percussion esclerometry, depth of carbonation front, the presence of chlorides, and the potential for
corrosion of reinforcement. The results indicate that despite a good quality of concrete, corrosion of
reinforcement is already at an advanced stage, with great loss of mass and high level of cracking of
structural parts.
Keywords: durability, pathology, rehabilitation, structural, electrochemical tests

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Análise das patologias em estruturas de concreto na zona litorânea da cidade do Recife-PE
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Análise das patologias em estruturas de concreto na zona litorânea da cidade do Recife-PE

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: X Congreso Latinoamericano de Patología y XII Congreso de Calidad en la Construcción
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO X Congreso Latinoamericano de Patología y XII Congreso de Calidad en la Construcción

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A inevitável agressão em estruturas de concreto localizadas em zonas costeiras remete a necessidade imperativa de manutenções preventivas, tendo em vista que a névoa salina apresenta-se como um elemento veicular operante de ataque por transportar cloretos, fundamentalmente, em peças de concreto armado aparente. Portanto, equipamentos com estrutura de concreto armado situados na orla marítima do Recife, tais como, observatório, chuveirão, bancos, poste de iluminação e aparelhos para exercícios, encontram-se visualmente num estágio avançado de deterioração. Este trabalho tem o objetivo de analisar as patologias em peças de concreto de uma Região litorânea do Recife-PE. Foi realizada ?in loco? uma ampla inspeção visual com acervo fotográfico e ensaio de carbonatação, bem como se coletou diversas amostras do concreto para verificar o teor do cloreto em laboratório. Os resultados indicaram que, segundo a análise do nível de deterioração estabelecido pelo boletim 162 do CEB (1983), as maiorias das peças precisam de intervenções imediatas e que, o nível de cloretos encontrados em todas as amostras, eram superiores aos níveis aceitáveis e prescritos na NBR 6118 (2004) e em outras normas internacionais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

Palavras

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: AVALIAÇÃO DOS PARAMETROS DE DUABILIDADE DA ESTRIUTURA DA PONTE SOBRE O RIO BOTAFOGO NA BR 101

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 51 IBRACON

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O objetivo deste trabalho é o estudo de concretos dosados a partir de duas curvas granulométricas ternárias otimizadas, com adição de 0%, 10% e 20% de filler calcário. Os concretos foram dosados com base no método IPT/EPUSP, gerando curvas de resistência à compressão e gráficos a/c x fcj. As curvas granulométricas otimizadas com a finalidade de obter concretos com uma maior compacidade, foram geradas com base numa equação do termo geral do somatório de uma progressão geométrica (P.G.). Verificou-se a influência do filler calcário em algumas propriedades do concreto nos estados fresco e endurecido e realizaram-se ensaios de resistência à compressão axial aos 28 dias. O teor ideal de argamassa foi determinado experimentalmente, fixando-se o abatimento de cone (?Slump Test?) em 100 ± 10 mm, observando-se a coesão e o cobrimento do agregado graúdo. Após a escolha deste teor ótimo de argamassa, definido para o traço 1:5, foi utilizado o mesmo teor para os traços 1:3 (Rico) e 1:6 (Pobre). A quantidade de água utilizada inicialmente foi calculada através da Lei de Lyse, relacionando-se volume de água/volume de concreto=abatimento constante. Foram moldados 15 corpos-de-prova medindo 10 x 20 cm, além de 1 corpo-de-prova medindo 15 x 30 cm, para cada traço de cada curva granulométrica; totalizando 360 corpos-de-prova de 10 x 20 cm e 24 corpos-de-prova de 15 x 30 cm.
Os agregados graúdo e miúdo utilizados foram os já disponíveis no Laboratório de Materiais de Construção da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE). Para o agregado graúdo, fez-se uma composição ternária das britas 0, 1 e 2. Na curva I, a proporção de brita utilizada foi: 22% de brita 0, 38% de brita 1 e 40% de brita 2. Na curva II, a composição foi a seguinte: 44% de brita 0, 26% de brita 1 e 30% de brita 2. Totalizando 35 kg de mistura da composição ternária para cada traço. Não foram realizados ensaios de reatividade nem umidade na areia utilizada. Fez-se um simples peneiramento antes da sua utilização, apen

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: ANALISE DA HIDRATAÇÃO DA FASE CSH EM PASTAS DE CIMENTO MODIFICADAS POR POLIMEROS ATRAVES DA TECNICIA DE RMN Si

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: VIII SIMPOSIO BRASILEIRO DE TECNOLOGIA DAS ARGAMASSAS
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO VIII SBTA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Argamassas e pastas de cimento modificadas por polímeros têm sido amplamente estudadas devido às melhorias das propriedades apresentadas por estes sistemas no estado endurecido. No entanto, as propriedades microestruturais e estudo de interações entre polímeros e cimento ainda são objetos de controvérsias, principalmente com relação ao C-S-H (silicato de cálcio hidratado). Este artigo tem por objetivo o estudo da cinética de hidratação de pastas de cimento modificadas com emulsões de base acrílica e acrílica-estirenada, com o teor de polímero em relação à massa do cimento de 10%, nas idades de 3 e 76 dias. Foi utilizada a técnica de RMN 29Si no estado sólido com o intuito de observar o grau de polimerização das cadeias de silicato com o decorrer da idade de hidratação e com relação aos tipos de polímeros empregados.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: COMPARAÇÃO DE ARGAMASSAS PARA RESTAURAÇÃO DE OBRAS HISTÓRICAS DOSADAS COM DOIS TIPOS DE METACAULIM PRODUZIDOS NO BRASIL

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 3 CONGRESSO PORTUGUES DE ARGAMASSAS DE CONSTRUÇÃO
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 3 APFAC2010

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neste trabalho se testou as propriedades de argamassas a base de cal e metacaulim para uso em restauração de obras históricas. Foram testados dois fabricantes de metacaulim do Brasil. O procedimento experimental consistiu em dosar dois traços unitários em massa comunentemente utilizados; a partir da dosagem das argamassas foram determinadas propriedades nos estados anidro, fresco e endurecido. No estado anidro foi determinada a massa unitária e a composição granulométrica da mistura. No estado fresco foi determinado consumo de água para uma consistência padrão de 250 +/- 10 mm e massa unitária. No estado endurecido foi determinado a densidade de massa, as resistências à compressão e à tração na flexão, a capilaridade e a variação de massa. Os resultados obtidos demonstraram não existir diferença significativa entre as propriedades das argamassas, com o mesmo traço e diferentes metacaulim, apesar dos dois tipos de metacaulim serem produzidos em regiões distintas no Brasil, pois se acreditava que a origem mineralógica poderia interferir no desempenho do metecaulim, conseqüentemente nas argamassas com propriedades diferenciadas.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Lime-metakaolin mortars applied on the Soledade palace, Recife, Brazil

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 2nd HISTORIC MORTARS CONFERENCE (RILEM TC 203 - RHM REPAIR MORTARS FOR HISTORIC MASONRY FINAL WORKSHOP)
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 2nd HMC 2010 (RILEM TC 203 - RHM)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The purpose of this work was to evaluate the characteristics of lime mortars with pozzolanic addition of metakaolin that were applied as plasters and renders over original brick masonries of the Soledade Palace, architectural heritage of Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil. This building, constructed in the XVII century, modified and extended through time, was indicated by the National Institute for Historic and Artistic Heritage as object of study due to being in renovation at that time in order to house the offices of its 5th Regional Department. The study involved the following variables: 1. Application over internal/external substrata; 2. Substrata with/without a previous lime-sand coat to increase brick-mortar bond; 3. Three proportions of mortars; 4. Use of dry slaked lime or of matured lime putty. The mortars were evaluated in function of its mechanical strengths and of brick-mortar bond. The results indicated that these mortars are appropriate to be used in building restoration and conservation works due to its compatibility, since being prepared observing standards and good practices of execution and applied in accordance with adequate techniques of restoration. Thus, these mortars will be able to protect and assure the integrity and durability of ancient masonries.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Lime-metakaolin mortars produced from kaolin wastes: hardened and microstructural propierties

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANNALS FROM 3RD HMC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Lime-pozzolan mortars are often used for restoration of historical buildings. Several studies have been developed about the use of wastes as construction materials. In Brazil the kaolin?s industry have generated a lot of wastes. Studies have been carried out on the use of kaolin wastes as replacement material for Portland cement concretes and mortars; and also in hydraulic mortars for restoration. In this work kaolin wastes were studied as pozzolan (MK) and aggregate in lime-pozzolan mortars. Mortars, with ratio by weight 1:3 (binder : aggregate) containing 50%-50% (lime-MK) and four different kaolin wastes content as replacement of river sand, were studied under two curing conditions (dry and moist). Hardened properties of these mortars like compressive and tensile strength, mass loss variation and capillarity were evaluated up to 180 days of curing. Microstructural characteristics also were assessed using thermal analysis (TG/DTG), x-rays diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM). Mortars under moist curing presented higher strengths than ones in dry curing. However the mortars cured in dry environment showed more stability when the river sand was replaced up to 30% concern to compressive strength. The major phases found by microstructural analysis were stratlingite (C2ASH8) and monocarboaluminate (C_4AC ̅H_11) for mortars in moist curing and for dry ones it was found as major phases monocarboaluminate and calcium carbonate.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 14th International Congress on the Chemistry of Cement (ICCC 2015)
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: anais 14th iccc

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This study is related to the evaluation of the feasibility in using sewage sludge ash as supplementary material in the production of concrete in the metropolitan area of Recife. The metropolitan area of Recife, capital of Pernambuco, in northeastern Brazil, currently has around 3.8 million people and features common to any large urban center problems. Among such problems record to those associated with the generation of solid waste, particularly those resulting from the treatment of domestic sewage. Whereas currently the sewage treatment reaches only 21% of the population of this area, one can consider that their influence is not significant at present; however is an ongoing project of Public-Private Partnership that pretente this service to raise the level of 81% in just 12 years, keeping it at this level for over 23 years. Accordingly, it is intended to reach the milestone of 5 million people served with wastewater in 35 years. Faced with this fact, the production of Sewage Sludge, today's difficult final destination, suffer an increase of 300% in this period, making it extremely relevant studies to ensure a final destination for the residue with the lowest possible environmental impact. For the study eight families of concrete were produced with two different traits, and a dash of classified structural and other non- structural concrete. In these four families, one was used as reference sample and the other three were produced using different levels of sludge cuts replacing the cement, which were respectively 5%, 8% and 12%. For fresh assay concrete properties were observed as workability and density assay and for the hardened state, it was found compressive strength, diametral tensile compression and water absorption by capillary action. To study the consistency, the concrete produced showed similar rebates, showing that the use of the ash had not a significant influence on workability. In the hardened state, the percentage of substitution of 8% showed the best

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Rheological Characteristics of Lime-Metakaolin Pastes Made of Kaolin Wastes
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Rheological Characteristics of Lime-Metakaolin Pastes Made of Kaolin Wastes

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 14th International Congress on the Chemistry of Cement (ICCC 2015)
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 14TH ICCC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Metakaolin has been presented as very good pozzolanic material for using in lime mortars and cement mortars. Alternatively, many studies have shown that wastes, coming from the kaolin production, can produce good quality pozzolans. In Brazil, industries, that produces kaolin, generates a lot of wastes, which are not placed in adequate sites or reused. Many studies have discussed about the microstructural characteristics and hardened properties of pastes, mortars or concretes mixes. There are few studies about rheological properties of this kind of paste. In this work pastes containing only hydrated lime (LP) and metakaolin+hydrated lime (L-MK) (made of the kaolin production waste) were assessed in their fresh state. Rheological characteristics, like yield stress, viscosity (static rheology test), viscous and elastic modulus (dynamic rheology test), creep and recovery behavior were studied. The results showed that the curves of pastes presented as a non-Newtonian fluid following a Herschel Bulkely moldel. When the metakaolin was added to lime paste the yield stress and the viscosity was lower. From the dynamic tests it was obtained that the L-MK pastes were less rigid than LP. And according to the creep and recovery tests these pastes presented a curve model as a viscoeslastic liquid.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Metakaolin has been presented as very good pozzolanic material for using in lime mortars and cement mortars. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
With the aim of analysing the behaviour of concrete with replacements of ground
clay bricks waste (GCBW) under reinforcement corrosion by chlorides, reinforced
concrete specimens with 80 x 80 x 80 mm were cast. The replacements were set at
0 %, 10 % and 30 % of cement weight and the water to cement ratio at 0.55. After
a 7-day wet curing and in a laboratory environment until the 180th day, the
specimens were subjected to wetting and drying cycles in a 1M sodium-chloride
solution. After identification of depassivation of the reinforcement, total and free
chloride profiles were obtained for each specimen. The results show that, although
there is a slight decrease in compressive strength and in critical chloride content
with GCBW addition to concrete, concretes with GCBW tend to show a reduction
in mass transport ability, which can override the previous aspect and extend the
initiation period of corrosion
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

specimens were subjected to wetting and drying cycles in a 1M sodium-chloride
solution. After identification of depassivation of the reinforcement, total and free
chloride profiles were obtained for each specimen. The results show that, although

with GCBW addition to concrete, concretes with GCBW tend to show a reduction
in mass transport ability, which can override the previous aspect and extend the
initiation period of corrosion

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: COMPARAÇÃO DE TRÊS ADITIVOS SUPERPLASTIFICANTES NA DOSAGEM DE CONCRETO AUTOADENSÁVEL COM 10% DE METACAULIM
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: COMPARAÇÃO DE TRÊS ADITIVOS SUPERPLASTIFICANTES NA DOSAGEM DE CONCRETO AUTOADENSÁVEL COM 10% DE METACAULIM

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 57 IBRACON

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O concreto autoadensável é um material que se espalha na fôrma sem a necessidade do adensamento. Este concreto demanda de uma quantidade maior de materiais finos, que são constituídos pelo cimento e adições minerais, em comparação com o concreto convencional. Também necessita de uma quantidade menor de agregados e da utilização de aditivo superplastificante. A adição mineral utilizada neste trabalho foi a metacaulim, em substituição de 10% da massa de cimento. O tipo de cimento empregado foi o CP V ARI RS e três aditivos superplastificante de base policarboxilatos. Os agregados graúdos utilizados foram o pó de pedra e pedras britadas de dimensão máxima de 12 mm e 19 mm, respectivamente B0 e B1. Misturaram-se os três tipos de brita em porcentagens variadas para obter a melhor curva granulométrica. Após a obtenção da curva ideal, realizaram-se dosagens para cada tipo de aditivo com a adição mineral e sem a substituição da metacaulim. Avaliou-se o concreto através dos requisitos de auto-compactabilidade por meio dos ensaios de espalhamento e Funil-V. Foram realizados ensaios de resistência à compressão aos 7 dias e 28 dias. Os aditivos superplastificantes A, B e C apresentaram teor de sólidos de 48%, 55% e 25%, respectivamente. A relação a/c dos concretos variaram entre 0,35 e 0,56. Os resultados no ensaio de espalhamento das dosagens sem metacaulim foram, em ordem crescente, a seguinte: C > A > B. Os resultados com o uso de metacaulim foram: A > C > B. No tempo para atingir 50 cm de espalhamento os concretos sem metacaulim tiveram os maiores resultados. No ensaio do V-Funil, os concretos do aditivo A e C com metacaulim apresentaram resultados maiores que o concreto sem metacaulim e o concreto com aditivo B apresentou maiores resultados sem a utilização do metacaulim. A resistência aos 28 dias dos concretos com aditivo A e C com metacaulim foram maiores que as dosagens sem metacaulim, já a dosagem com aditivo B apresentou resultados melhores sem a utilização de metaca

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The aim of this study is to employ tailings of ornamental industry in mortars. The
sandy rock crushing, ABR was used to replace natural sand in the traces of mortar by volume of
1: 1: 3; 1: 2: 9 and 1: 3: 12 in the ratio of 1: 3 binder: aggregate. six traits were in duplicate and
the evaluation of the technological properties of mortars followed the regulatory standards of
ABNT. The varied morphology of sand ABR, a factor, that contributes to greater cohesion and
lower viscosity of the mortar in the fresh state. At 28 days, the water is not the main factor
determining to decrease the compressive strength and flexural ABR with mortars and mortars
with natural sand. The volumes of the order of 1: 1: 3, 1: 2: 9 and 1: 3: 12 featuring the decrease
in mechanical strength of mortars. The use of crushed waste contributes to the practice of
sustainability.
Keywords: Mech

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: COMPARATIVE STUDY BETWEEN INDUSTRIAL MORTARS FOR INTERVENTION IN HISTORICAL WORKS

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 4 th Historic Mortars Conference - HMC 2016
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: Laboratory of Building Materials Department of Civil Engineering Aristotle University of Thessalon

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Atividades ligadas ao patrimônio cultural e ambiental

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Intervention in works of historical importance is complex due to the need for compatibility among the materials and the search to maintain the originality of the building. This study has compared the properties of Brazilian industrial mortars (I and II types) with the aim of restoration in modernist historical buildings of the twentieth century, with over 50 years in Brazil. It has been evaluated six mortars from different manufacturers, with cement and lime binders in their composition and additives. Besides, it has been analyzed anhydrous, fresh and hardened layers by the tests: granulometry, apparent mass density, binder content, firmness, strength, weight variation and water absorption. Results have shown binder/aggregate different proportions among mortars. The particle size distribution, mass density in loose state and water consumption are similar. The I-type mortars have exhibited greater mass change relative to II-type mortars. Whereas the apparent mass (fresh and hardened) density and water absorption of the opposite have occurred. The mechanical performance of the type-II mortars were higher than type I

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 9th International Conference On Concrete Under Severe Conditions Environment and Loading
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings 9th International Conference On Concrete Under Severe Conditions - Environment and Loading

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Significant amount of Special Engineering Structures (SES) of Brazilian highways are currently in advanced state of degradation due the presence of pathological manifestations and damage structures. These problems, when associated with the lack of routine inspections and preventive maintenance, can compromise both the functionality and stability of these bridges, viaducts and footbridges that make up the country's road system. On the federal highways of Pernambuco, there are approximately 600 registered bridges and viaducts by the National Department of Transport Infrastructure (DNIT); Of this total, 120 SES are located in the BR-101 / PE, built in the 60's and whose northern section stands out as one of the main traffic corridors, including for the transportation of heavy loads destined to the industrial pole of the city of Goiana and to the States of the Northeast Region. The high intensity of traffic, associated to the strong environmental aggressiveness, characteristics of the industrial zone and
coastal area, contribute a lot to the structural deterioration of the SES of this highway. It is in this context that this work aims to study the situation of the Igarassu River?s Bridge, in BR-101 / PE, considering its current structural conditions, especially those of the board, characterized by concrete degradation, corroded by the absence of the covering layer and by the lack of adhesion between concrete and reinforcements; there are still serious damage to the bearings. The study consisted of visual inspection, survey of existing geometry, and a preliminary structural analysis to better assess the performance and safety of the structure under the effects of existing damages.Recommendations are also showed for immediate and final actions to increase the safety, functionality and durability of the bridge that is the object of this work
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Significant amount of Special Engineering Structures (SES) of Brazilian highways are currently in advanced state of degradation due the presence of pathological manifestations and damage structures. These problems, when associated with the lack of routine inspections and preventive maintenance, can compromise both the functionality and stability of these bridges, viaducts and footbridges that make up the country's road system. On the federal highways of Pernambuco, there are approximately 600 registered bridges and viaducts by the National Department of Transport Infrastructure (DNIT); Of this total, 120 SES are located in the BR-101 / PE, built in the 60's and whose northern section stands out as one of the main traffic corridors, including for the transportation of heavy loads destined to the industrial pole of the city of Goiana and to the States of the Northeast Region. The high intensity of traffic, associated to the strong environmental aggressiveness, characteristics of the industrial zone and
coastal area, contribute a lot to the structural deterioration of the SES of this highway. It is in this context that this work aims to study the situation of the Igarassu River?s Bridge, in BR-101 / PE, considering its current structural conditions, especially those of the board, characterized by concrete degradation, corroded by the absence of the covering layer and by the lack of adhesion between concrete and reinforcements; there are still serious damage to the bearings. The study consisted of visual inspection, survey of existing geometry, and a preliminary structural analysis to better assess the performance and safety of the structure under the effects of existing damages. Recommendations are also showed for immediate and final actions to increase the safety, functionality and durability of the bridge that is the object of this work .

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: STUDY OF PROPERTIES OF GYPSUM PLASTERS OF ARARIPE?S POLE FOR APPLICATION IN RESTORATION MORTARS
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: STUDY OF PROPERTIES OF GYPSUM PLASTERS OF ARARIPE?S POLE FOR APPLICATION IN RESTORATION MORTARS

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings pro130 : 5th Historic Mortars Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: International Union of Laboratories and Experts in Construction Materials, Systems and Structures

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Plaster is the earliest binder known. Findings have revealed that this material was already used to manufacture containers and plasters for decorative purposes around 9000 B.C.. Since then, it has been used extensively for indoor masonry coatings.In order to obtain the gypsum plaster powder, it is necessary to make the proper gypsum mineral selection, to have a production control in relation to the type of furnace, calcination temperature, cooking time, type and concentration of additives, impurities, particle size, water/plaster, time of mixing, among others, that will influence the type and quality of the plaster. Brazilian northeastern has an advantage in relation to the other regions of the world, because it presents abundance and quality of the gypsum raw material, especially in the Araripe?s Pole, where gypsum plaster is produced in companies of different sizes and production control. There is a need for physical and mechanical characterization of these materials for application as gypsum-based restoration mortars. One of the most important requirements for historic masonry mortars is bonding, followed by mechanical strength. In this context, it is verified that the gypsum of the Araripe?s Polo can be an excellent option for execution and repair of historical coatings. In order to know in detail the material and to understand the relation between the form of production of the plasters and influence in the characteristics of these materials, the relationship between gypsum production control characterized by firm size and gypsum properties was evaluated. The experimental program of the study was divided in two stages: study of characterization of the gypsum plaster powder and evaluation of the bond strength of the coatings executed in gypsum paste. Six samples of gypsum powder were collected from different producers in the region. In the first stage, the characterization study was carried out with anhydrous, fresh and hardened state by means of technological, c

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Analysis of pathological manifestations of a residential building - Case study
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Analysis of pathological manifestations of a residential building - Case study

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 9th International Conference On Concrete Under Severe Conditions Environment and Loading
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings 9th International Conference On Concrete Under Severe Conditions - Environment and Loading

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Despite the growing concern in obtaining the quality of buildings, it has still been observed a large number of buildings showing pathological problems of various kinds. Therefore, this study aims to report the pathological manifestations of a building located in the city of Recife under severe environmental conditions, identifying its probable causes and making a comparison with structural elements designed in accordance with the standard NBR 6118 (2014). It was performed a methodology based on the case study, with surveys using the check-list of ABECE (2005). With the results, it was possible to verify that among the pathological manifestations identified, the ones that showed a higher incidence were: infiltration, cracks, bars corrosion and detachment of coatings. These pathological manifestations were probably caused by poor waterproofing, little cover layer of steel and use of inappropriate material, resulting in a building designed in an inefficient way in relation to the present days. The lack of preventive maintenance contributed to the appearance of these pathological manifestations.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Analysis of pathological manifestations present in a slab from an old construction - Case study
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Analysis of pathological manifestations present in a slab from an old construction - Case study

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 9th International Conference On Concrete Under Severe Conditions Environment and Loading
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings 9th International Conference On Concrete Under Severe Conditions - Environment and Loading

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The diagnosis of the levels of pathological manifestations and monitoring have great importance when it is necessary to perform a maintenance in a structure, once that, if the problem is identified and corrected earlier, the damage caused will be lessened and there will be savings in the maintenance of the structures. In this way, this study aimed to evaluate the pathological manifestations present in a slab from an old construction in the city of Recife. It was used visual inspection, evaluation of surface hardness using Schmidt sclerometer and test for determination of depth of carbonation using phenolphthalein indicator solution. The value of estimated average compressive strength was 26.8 MPa. The average sclerometer index resulted in bad concrete coverage quality. The recently fractured regions in the slab concrete, after sprinkling phenolphthalein solution, did not present any sign of carbonation. The environmental aggressive class is moderate and the environmental conditions with elevated humidity favour the corrosion mechanism. In some regions of the slab, the coverage of positive rebars was almost inexistent, in disagreement with the test method NBR 6118:2014, with detachment of concrete, exposure of rebar and brown-reddish spots, characteristic of iron oxide, which is a corrosion product. Therefore, it was verified that the slab had insufficient coverage and that it was not detected the presence of carbonic anhydride, indicating that the structure does not present corrosion by carbonation.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The diagnosis of the levels of pathological manifestations and monitoring have great importance when it is necessary to perform a maintenance in a structure, once that, if the problem is identified and corrected earlier, the damage caused will be lessened and there will be savings in the maintenance of the structures. The value of estimated average compressive strength was 26.8 MPa. The average sclerometer index resulted in bad concrete coverage quality. The recently fractured regions in the slab concrete, after sprinkling phenolphthalein solution, did not present any sign of carbonation. The environmental aggressive class is moderate and the environmental conditions with elevated humidity favour the corrosion mechanism. Therefore, it was verified that the slab had insufficient coverage and that it was not detected the presence of carbonic anhydride, indicating that the structure does not present corrosion by carbonation.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Use of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles for Inspection of Bridges and Viaducts in Northeast Brazil

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Forensic Engineering 2022

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) are tools that are utilized in inspections that can
minimize human risk when working at high heights. UAVs provide access to critical locations
and they are cost-effective compared to traditional methods. This study is aimed at analyzing the
structural conditions of a steel bridge and a reinforced concrete viaduct, using an UAV. The steel
bridge is in Paulo Afonso and the reinforced concrete viaduct is in Garanhuns, both cities located
in northeastern Brazil. Drone models DJI were used. Aerial records were made to identify
possible pathological manifestations and to characterize the preservation of the structures. As
results, oxidation spots were found on the bars and cracks and efflorescence were found on the
foundation of the steel bridge. On the viaduct, more than the cracks and efflorescence, exposed
reinforcements were found in a state of degradation. Thus, the efficiency of using the UAVs for
the evaluation of the bridge and the viaduct was verified.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Using kaolin mining waste to produce sustainable building materials
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Using kaolin mining waste to produce sustainable building materials

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 16th International Congress on the Chemistry of Cement

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Coleta, tratamento e disposição de resíduos; recuperação de materiais

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The construction industry is responsible for 36% of global energy use and almost 40% of global greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions. Besides that a huge amount of waste is produced from the building and construction sector. In this scenario it is strong necessary the use of innovative and sustainable processes to produce mineral based materials that minimize the use of resources as well as with low-waste and low-emission. So it is essential to come up with technological solutions focused on the circular economy approach that replaces the open product system by a close loop one. In this context increasing the use of waste or recycled materials to produce building materials is one alternative to save energy and conserve resources. This work evaluates the use of kaolin mining waste as partial replacement of cement in cementitious pastes. Parameters such as temperature of calcination during waste processing phase and the replacement content of kaolin waste in cement pastes were investigated. The study focused on the system rheological behavior. For this purpose a cylinder concentric rheometer was used for the rheological measurements. Results showed an optimal content of kaolin waste that can be used as cement replacement without compromise the system rheological properties

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: RECYCLED AGGREGATE CONCRETE DOSED WITH OPTIMIZED MIXTURES: PROPERTIES IN THE FRESH AND HARDENED STATE

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: V International Conference Progress of Recycling in the Built Environment
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: V International Conference Progress of Recycling in the Built Environment

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Serviços para edifícios e atividades paisagísticas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This study investigated the use of recycled aggregates from construction and demolition waste in concrete performance. To achieve an ideal mix, Excel was employed to simulate natural aggregates with four particle sizes (1.20mm, 6.3mm, 9.5mm, 12.5mm). Two concrete formulations, A and B, were created, each divided into three mix groups (GI, GII, and GIII). GI (reference) with 100% natural aggregates. GII substituted 100% of the 12.5mm natural aggregate with CDWCA, while GIII replaced 100% of the 1.20mm natural aggregate with CDWMS. In A, mortar content (α) was set at 0.5, with a 100 ± 10mm slump, while formulation B maintained a consistent water-to-cement (w/c) ratio and incorporated a superplasticizer. Mechanical strength was assessed at 7, 28, and 90 days. Notably, GIII, without additives and using CDWMS, exhibited superior mechanical strength compared to additive-containing cases. CDWMS's fine texture and adherent clay hindered additive effectiveness, delaying concrete strength development. GIII displayed more significant strength reductions due to increased fine aggregate content. GI and GII exhibited similar strength trends. Overall, higher w/c ratios were associated with reduced mechanical resistance. Optimized mixes favored complete replacement of natural aggregate with recycled aggregate (RA), with additives mitigating RA's high water absorption effects.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: IMPACTOS AMBIENTAIS DA UTILIZAÇÃO LODO TÊXTIL EM CONCRETO ASFÁLTICO AO SER EXPOSTO À ÁGUA

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: Anais da 49ª Reunião Anual de Pavimentação RAPv
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Anais da 49a Reunião Anual de Pavimentação - RAPv

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Textile sludge is a byproduct of treating effluent generated in industrial laundries, where clothing dyeing processes are carried out. There are several records in the literature of incorporating such waste into construction materials, achieving satisfactory mechanical and environmental performance. Therefore, the incorporation of textile sludge into asphalt concrete was carried out, adding it directly to the aggregates and also mixing it previously with the binder. The addition was made in proportions of 2 to 5% of textile sludge per total mass of the asphalt mixture, for both incorporation methods. Based on the parameters of the Marshall dosing methodology and the DNIT ES 31/2006 standard, specimens with 2% and 3% insertion showed the best results. In this sense, the objective of this study is to evaluate the immobilization of textile sludge in asphalt mixtures when subjected to water solubilization. For the solubilization test, the methodology proposed by the ABNT NBR 10006:2004 standard was used. Regarding the pH of the solubilized extract, values very close to neutral were obtained, with all evaluated solutions being slightly alkaline and meeting regulatory limits. For organic matter and total molybdenum, 100% retention occurred for all evaluated samples. Regarding calcite, magnesium, sodium, and potassium, retention of over 99% occurred. For salinity, a 99% reduction was observed, and for alkalinity in CaCO3, 98%. Therefore, it is evident that asphalt mixtures were efficient in immobilizing textile sludge, thus capable of promoting the reduction of environmental damage from this industrial waste.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Utilização de resíduos de materiais de construção civil na fabricação de argamassas

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: XX ENCONTRO NACIONAL DE TECNOLOGIA DO AMBIENTE CONSTRUÍDO

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The excessive exploitation of mineral aggregates for mortar production results in scarcity and environmental impacts. The use of construction waste, such as stone dust and demolition 
XX ENTAC 2024 ?A Construção Civil na Era Digital: pesquisa, inovação e capacitação profissional 2waste, emerges as a sustainable alternative. This study investigates the dosage of mortars with these wastes, used individually and in binary mixtures, as an inert fraction above #0.075 mm (sieve 200), replacing sand with an optimized granulometric composition for better grain packing. The granulometric composition and bulk density of the mixtures in the anhydrous state were analyzed. In the fresh state, workability, air content, and fresh bulk density were evaluated. In the hardened state, compressive strength was analyzed. In binary samples with stone dust and construction and demolition waste, there was an increase in strength of 15.30% and 2.49%, respectively, compared to the reference sample. All mortars showed compressive strength above 6.0 MPa, meeting the requirements for masonry mortars with and without structural function. These results promote sustainability, reducing environmental impacts and recycling waste in construction

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Aplicação da avaliação do ciclo de vida em blocos cerâmicos fabricados com adição do lodo de estações de tratamento de água

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: XX ENCONTRO NACIONAL DE TECNOLOGIA DO AMBIENTE CONSTRUÍDO

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The study proposed the application of Life Cycle Assessment in the production of ceramic blocks using clay and sludge from water treatment plants as raw materials. The main objective was to analyze carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions and primary energy demand associated with different 
XX ENTAC 2024 ?A Construção Civil na Era Digital: pesquisa, inovação e capacitação profissional 2proportions of Water Treatment Plant sludge incorporated into the ceramic blocks. The methodology focused on CO2and embodied energy indicators. The results revealed the feasibility of partially replacing clay with sludge, highlighting the TA90L10 composition as the ideal proportion for the production of ceramic blocks, balancing efficiency in sludge incorporation and environmental impacts. Furthermore, the comparative analysis between the centrifuge and filter press drying processes demonstrated that the latter (filter press) was more sustainable in terms of CO2emissions and primary energy demand, with a reduction of 5% and 14%, respectively. These findings reinforced the importance of careful selection of production processes and mixing compositions to minimize environmental impacts in the manufacture of ceramic blocks.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Metodologia de gerenciamento do processo de projeto em convênios de obras de pequeno porte

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: XX ENCONTRO NACIONAL DE TECNOLOGIA DO AMBIENTE CONSTRUÍDO

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Basic projects (PB) of convenants with long approval time result in reduced efficiency in executing the object.This work presents a case study, with the discussion of the results of the application of a design process management methodology in small public constructions convenants, which usedas a reference the PMBOK® guide, a 03-stage adaptation procedure and principles of lean thought, with a focus on reducing approval time and consequently total duration time. The methodology was applied to the PB stage of 06 convenantsmonitored by the Public Institution, achieving an average reduction in approval time of 43.35%, compared to the situation observed in the database instruments raised for the same Institution in previous years, and 55.76%, in relation to the results of agreements signed in the same year, for the same 
XX ENTAC 2024 ?A Construção Civil na Era Digital: pesquisa, inovação e capacitação profissional 2type of work and monitored by the Public Institution, but which did not use the management proposal methodology. The results suggest the effectiveness of the methodology in reducing the PB approval time, as well as corroborating previous studies, in the direction that the use of a management methodology adapted to the type of project is more efficient than the use of generic methodologies

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Contribuição à estimativa da vigência em convênios para execução de obras

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: XX ENCONTRO NACIONAL DE TECNOLOGIA DO AMBIENTE CONSTRUÍDO

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The prediction of the duration of anconvenant is prerequisite for its signature. However, many times this forecast has low accuracy and ends up resulting in rework related to time additives or even anticipation of accountability. This work seeks to contribute to the forecast of the durationof convenants for execution of engineering constructions by verifying which variables, available until the signature, can explain the variation of the duration, with subsequent forecasting of the model through multiple linear regression, with data from the Brazil?s Northeast Development Superintendence -Sudene. The results sugests that the variables Global Value, Time until the celebration, IDTRV and the typologiesof constructions generate good adjustment and acceptable accuracy in the model and can assist in estimating the duration of the convenants monitored by Sudene, suporting on adherence to the planning.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: ANÁLISE DA DENSIDADE E DA RESISTÊNCIA À COMPRESSÃO DE CONCRETOS DOSADOS COM SUBSTITUIÇÃO DO AGREGADO GRAÚDO POR EVA

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 65 CBC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The search for new technologies to further improve concrete constructions is driving the search for new materials to improve the properties of concrete. EVA (ethylene vinyl acetate), for example, has great potential for application in cementitious composites as it improves thermal and acoustic properties and is an alternative to lightweight aggregates. Therefore, this study evaluated the effect of replacing gravel by EVA in different percentages, 33%, 66% and 100% of EVA. The mix used was a 1:2:3 ratio, cement:sand:gravel by mass. The w/c ratio was altered to obtain the same cone trunk slump of 20cm + or - 1cm, with a water-reducing additive, superplasticizer. In the fresh state, the slump and bulk density were measured. In the hardened state, the compressive strength at 28 days was measured. Eight specimens were molded for each mix to calculate the mean and standard deviation. The results were that the replacement mixes had a dry density of less than 2000 Kg/m³ and a compressive strength of less than 10 MPa, classifying them as non-structural lightweight concrete.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Estudo da Influência do Empacotamento de Partículas na Resistência a Compressão e Trabalhabilidade de Argamassas

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 65 CBC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
With advances in civil construction, the search for high strength concrete is increasingly common, but an
obstacle encountered is the need to increase cement consumption, which implies an increase in its final cost. This problem can be solved using the principle of particle packing. Particle packing theory consists of using smaller diameter materials to fill the voids left by larger diameter materials, thus tending to maximize their density, which can lead to better strength, durability and overall performance. This article aims to analyze the influence of the degree of particle packing on both workability and compressive strength in order to obtain a mortar that has greater mechanical strength. For this, initially, a reference mix composed of cement, fine aggregate and water in the proportion 1:3:0.48, in mass, is dosed without adjusting the granulometric curve and then a trace adjusting the granulometric curve through the packaging model of Alfred. In the fresh state, workability is tested via consistency index (NBR 13276:2016). As for the hardened state, 12 specimens perline are molded for compression testing (NBR 7215: 2019) at 3, 7 and 28 days. Tests revealed that mortar with fine aggregate with adjusted granulometric curve showed greater resistance. The standard mix obtained
compressive strength of approximately 18, 23 and 24 MPa, at 3.7 and 28 days respectively. How much the adjusted trace resulted in approximately 28, 34 and 35 MPa. Furthermore, the adjusted trace had better workability, spreading to 26.33 cm compared to 17 cm of the standard trace.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Influência da incorporação de borracha granulada em argamassas

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 65 CBC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In the construction industry, there is a significant consumption and production of raw materials, which leads to a considerable generation of waste. The improper disposal of this waste represents a major environmental challenge today. In response, there is a growing trend to make better use of the waste produced, encouraging more sustainable practices, such as the implementation of recycling techniques for a variety of materials, including rubber. Studies highlight the benefits of using waste tires in construction, offering technical, economic, and environmental advantages, in addition to contributing to the sustainability of the sector. This article explores the performance of mortars reinforced with granulated rubber in different proportions, aiming to examine their behavior under impact stress. To assess impact resistance, a test adapted from the impactresistance test for ceramic floors (NBR 9454, 1986) was conducted, where a body is dropped freely onto the center of a plate placed in a standardized sand box. The results obtained through the consistency index revealed that the addition of granulated rubber reduces the flow of the mortar. The inclusion of 10% granulated rubber does not significantly affect workability, resulting in a flow similar to that of the reference mix (RM), while the addition of 30% reduced the flow by up to 38%. In the hardened state, all tested proportions resulted in an increase in impact resistance, with the mix containing 30% granulated rubber showing a resistance gain of approximately 108%.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Estudo da influência do teor de fibras em argamassas submetidas a esforços de impacto

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 65 CBC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
When subjected to special conditions, such as cyclic loads or impact, conventional mortar demonstrates
unsatisfactory performance. This occurs due to its fragility when subjected to tensile forces, significantly
compromising its ability to handle dynamic loads. Consequently, an alternative to mitigate this deficiency is to add fibers to the mortar. The interaction of fibers with the cementitious matrix minimizes the
characteristic brittle behavior. The mortar becomes a pseudo-ductile material, meaning it continues to
exhibit residual strength even after cracking. In order to enrich the discussion, this article aims to deepen
the analysis of the performance of mortars reinforced with three different types of fibers - polypropylene,
steel, and macrostructural - in different proportions, with the objective of examining their behavior under
impact loads. To achieve this, the effects of fiber use were analyzed both in the fresh and hardened states of the mortar. In the fresh state, the workability test was performed using the consistency index, according to NBR 13276:2016. For the test in the hardened state, an impact test adapted from the ceramic tile impact resistance test (NBR 9454, 1986) was conducted, in which a body falls freely onto the center of a plate placed in a standardized sand-filled box. The analysis of the consistency index revealed that the inclusion of fibers reduces the opening of the mortar, regardless of the type or content. The metallic fibers have better workability, reducing the opening by a maximum of 12%. As for the hardened state, all fibers and contents resulted in increased impact resistance. The macrostructural fiber stands out, with an increase in resistance of at least 425%.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Influência de diferentes métodos de cura no concreto pós reativo

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ANAIS DO 65 CBC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
In civil constructions, it is of great importance to have good visual quality and aesthetics of the building, in addition to ensuring structural safety. A major problem that can occur, compromising its structure and
resistance, is the appearance of pathological manifestations of fissures and cracks in the concrete used in construction. One solution to this obstacle is precisely the concrete curing technique. This technique
consists of delaying the evaporation of water used in the mixture preparation, thus allowing the complete
hydration of the cement, resulting in the formation of a solid and resistant structure. Basically, concrete
curing is of great importance and aims to optimize the physical and mechanical properties of the material, ensuring its durability, strength, and performance over time. Furthermore, it brings cost savings, reducing repairs and replacements, and providing greater structural safety. Thus, this article aims to analyze the different curing methods: air curing, thermal curing, immersion curing, and immersion curing in Calcium Hydroxide solution, aiming to analyze their influence on the compression test of cylindrical test specimens according to NBR 7215:2019. For the tests, we will use a post-reactive concrete mix, and for each curing method, we will mold 15 test specimens with dimensions of 50 mm in diameter by 100 mm in height, with 5 test specimens being ruptured for each compression test. Initially, the compression tests were planned to be conducted at the ages of 7, 14, and 28 days. However, due to technical problems with the thermal curing equipment, the tests were conducted at the ages of 7, 14, and 21 days.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: MÉTODO DE AVALIAÇÃO DO DESEMPENHO AMBIENTAL DE REVESTIMENTO DE FACHADA COM ARGAMASSA

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 5º Congresso Luso-Brasileiro de Materiais de Construção Sustentáveis (CLBMCS 2024)
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ATAS DO CLBMCS2024
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: CERIS - Instituto de Investigação e Inovação em Engenharia Civil para a Sustentabilidade

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A indústria da construção evoluiu no sentido do desenvolvimento econômico regional, sem abordar as questões ambientais. Este estudo teve como objetivo desenvolver uma metodologia objetiva para aplicação em emboços externos de argamassa, a fim de quantificar seis aspectos ambientais na fase de pré-construção. A metodologia consistiu em três fases: estudo preliminar, desenvolvimento do modelo e validação do método. A primeira fase investigou a sustentabilidade na indústria da construção, aspectos ambientais, métodos de avaliação ambiental e normas/regulamentos de gestão ambiental. Na segunda fase foi selecionada a atividade construtiva de emboço externo de argamassa e aspectos ambientais. Na terceira fase foram calculados os impactos ambientais. Por fim, o modelo preditivo foi aplicado ao componente do revestimento de argamassa para validação dos impactos ambientais. Os resultados demonstraram uma redução de cinco impactos ambientais no estudo de caso quando comparado ao estudo teórico, a saber: emissões de gases de efeito estufa: 5,72 kgCO2e; poluição do solo: 3.420,00 mg; uso de recursos e matérias-primas: 1,1409E-12 impacto total; resíduos de construção e demolição: 0,68 kg e uso de energia: 76,00 Mj. Nesta pesquisa inovadora, foram investigados os aspectos ambientais do emboço externo da argamassa, utilizando indicadores aplicáveis a cada aspecto, eliminando assim a subjetividade das avaliações anteriores. O componente do revestimento em argamassa denominado emboço foi avaliado de forma objetiva com base em uma metodologia de quantificação dos aspectos ambientais na fase de pré-construção.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: REVISÃO SISTEMÁTICA DA LITERATURA SOBRE OS ESTUDOS DOS MATERIAIS METÁLICOS

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 5º Congresso Luso-Brasileiro de Materiais de Construção Sustentáveis (CLBMCS 2024)
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: ATAS DO CLBMCS2024
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: CERIS - Instituto de Investigação e Inovação em Engenharia Civil para a Sustentabilidade

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Os estudos sobre os materiais metálicos antigos representaram informações que puderam ampliar a compreensão da evolução dos materiais metálicos no mundo. Este estudo teve como objetivo investigar de forma sistemática as pesquisas publicadas sobre arqueometalurgia com intuito de elucidar os principais aspectos dos materiais metálicos produzidos na antiguidade. Esta pesquisa direcionou as buscas sobre o tema na base de dados da Web of Science no período de 1945 até 2022 utilizando o string arqueometalurgia. A metodologia desta pesquisa seguiu uma abordagem de métodos mistos de revisão sistemática com a utilização do método PRISMA (Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-analysis) para realização da pesquisa bibliométrica quantitativa e posteriormente, uma avaliação dos artigos incluídos através de métodos qualitativos. Em paralelo, um software denominado de VOSviewers foi utilizado para análise quantitativa dos documentos, periódicos, autores, países e instituições mais citadas. Os resultados demonstraram que as publicações referentes ao tema iniciaram a partir de 1987. Os periódicos, autores, instituições, artigos e países mais citados, em sua maioria, concentraram-se na America do Norte, Europa e Asia. As técnicas utilizadas para investigação dos materiais metálicos foram microscopia eletrônica de varredura com 28%, microscopia óptica com 26%, fluorescência de raio-x com 18%, microdureza com 9%, difração de raio-x com 8%, outros com 8%, raio-x com 2% e scanner com 1%. Finalmente, os estudos sobre os materiais metálicos puderam fornecer uma compreensão da história da tecnologia de produção e contribuir para ampliação do conhecimento de como as civilizações viviam no passado, bem como serviram de parâmetro para o desenvolvimento de materiais alternativos e sustentáveis.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: ESTUDO PILOTO DO USO DO LODO DE ETA?S EM ARGAMASSAS

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 1o Encontro Nacional de Lodo de Tratamento de Estação de Agua - Conexões para Inovação Tecnológica
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Anais do LETA1o Encontro Nacional de Lodo de Tratamento de Estação de Agua - Conexões para Inovação Tecnológica

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A estação de tratamento de água (ETA) compreende uma indústria onde ocorre a transformação da matéria-prima, água bruta, em um produto final, que é a água tratada. Através desse processo geram-se resíduos nocivos ao meio ambiente e que prejudicam a qualidade de vida garantida por legislação. Por muito tempo o lodo era despejado em cursos de águas próximas as estações de tratamento ou em aterros, porém, conforme a ABNT NBR 10004 (2004) o lodo de ETA é classificado como resíduo sólido pertencente a classe II A (não inerte), que impossibilita o seu lançamento em corpos de água ou na rede pública de esgoto sanitário, exigindo assim tecnologias adequadas para o seu tratamento e disposição final. O trabalho tem como objetivo avaliar a incorporação do lodo de ETA em argamassas de cimento, cal e areia, de modo a verificar a estabilidade física e química do lodo quando misturado ao cimento Portland, bem como as propriedades das argamassas nos estados fresco e endurecido.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Caracterizacao estrutural e microestrutural do gesso produzido pelo polo gesseiro de araripina
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Caracterizacao estrutural e microestrutural do gesso produzido pelo polo gesseiro de araripina

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O processo produtivo no Pólo Gesseiro de Araripina-PE é muito diversificado, em virtude do grande número de empresas calcinadoras e da falta de padronização no recebimento das gipsitas que são extraídas, tornando difícil o processo de otimização da qualificação destes materiais, para efeito comercial e de pesquisa acadêmica. Neste trabalho foram realizadas caracterizações estruturais e microestruturais das gipsitas e dos seus sub-produtos. Foram utilizadas técnicas de caracterização físicas, químicas e mecânicas com microscopias óptica
e eletrônica de varredura e os resultados obtidos servirão de base ao projeto de utilização de gesso na fabricação de blocos reforçados com fibras naturais e/ou sintéticas como alternativa à alvenaria na construção civil.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

Neste trabalho foram realizadas caracterizações estruturais e microestruturais das gipsitas e dos seus sub-produtos. Foram utilizadas técnicas de caracterização físicas, químicas e mecânicas com microscopias óptica
e eletrônica de varredura e os resultados obtidos servirão de base ao projeto de utilização de gesso na fabricação de blocos reforçados com fibras naturais e/ou sintéticas como alternativa à alvenaria na construção civil.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Effect of Metakaolin¿s finesses and content in self-consolidating concrete
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Effect of Metakaolin?s finesses and content in self-consolidating concrete

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Self-consolidating concrete is characterized by its high deformability or its capability of filling all the spaces without external forces, maintaining the stability, without segregation or blocking. SCC needs high content of fines, which could be mineral admixtures, superplasticizer and low content of aggregates with limited maximum dimensions. Present work intends to verify the effect of the finesses and content of Metakaolin in SCC properties with different paste volumes, at fresh and hardened states. Metakaolin was used at three different finesses and at 5% and 35% of substitution to cement mass. It was found that the superplasticizer consumption increased with higher finesses and content of Metakaolin. Increasing the paste volume, less superplasticizer was necessary. Better mixtures were obtained with the paste contents of 0.45 and 0.50, by total volume, which presented good cohesion and a reduced admixture consumption. However, for the compressive strength, a reduction occurred at high paste volumes.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Self-consolidating concrete is characterized by its high deformability or its capability of filling all the spaces without external forces, maintaining the stability, without segregation or blocking. SCC needs high content of fines, which could be mineral admixtures, superplasticizer and low content of aggregates with limited maximum dimensions. Present work intends to verify the effect of the finesses and content of Metakaolin in SCC properties with different paste volumes, at fresh and hardened states. Metakaolin was used at three different finesses and at 5% and 35% of substitution to cement mass. It was found that the superplasticizer consumption increased with higher finesses and content of Metakaolin. Increasing the paste volume, less superplasticizer was necessary. Better mixtures were obtained with the paste contents of 0.45 and 0.50, by total volume, which presented good cohesion and a reduced admixture consumption. However, for the compressive strength, a reduction occurred at high paste volumes.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Contribution to the obtainment of concrete elastic modulus using micromechanics modeling

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revista IBRACON de Estruturas e Materiais

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Mathematical expressions from national codes show that concrete elastic modulus is a function of concrete compressive strength. But concrete, regarded as a three-phase composite material, has elastic properties directly affected by the interfacial transition zone (ITZ), which is characterized by its higher porosity in comparison to the cement paste. Micromechanical models such as the Mori-Tanaka and three-phase sphere may be applied with good results when used to analyze the concrete. This paper presents a study on the evolution of the concrete elastic modulus, this study is carried out by the application of normative expressions and micromechanics models. Compared to the experimental results, a good fitting of micromechanical modeling with ITZ included is observed. Additionally, the quality of the NBR 6118:2003 and CEB-90 expressions is confirmed.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Modelagem micromecânica aplicada para a obtenção do modulo de elasticidade de concretos estruturais
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Modelagem micromecânica aplicada para a obtenção do modulo de elasticidade de concretos estruturais

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revista Portuguesa de Engenharia de Estruturas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Dados da revista: Série II | n.º 13 | maio de 2013 .ISSN: 0870-984X.

Artigo com base na tese de doutoramento do Anderson Henrique Barbosa
The elastic modulus of concrete is an important property of this material, used for
structural verification. Formulations presents in both national and international
standards and others researchers express this property in terms of compressive strength
presented in given age. In micromechanics, the concrete is assumed to a three-phase
composite material, composed of aggregates as dispersed phase, the transition zone as
interface, and cement paste as matrix. The elastic modulus of concrete is a property that
is directly linked to the properties presented by the transition zone, which is
characterized by high porosity on the matrix. With prior knowledge of the properties of
the constituents, can be applied to micromechanics modeling to determine the elastic
properties of concrete. Models such as Mori-Tanaka and three phases sphere show good
results when used for analysis of concrete. The properties of the transition zone were
obtained by applying the inversion of the three phase sphere model. Of experimental
results it was possible to express the evolution of the elastic modulus of concrete
according to the volume fraction of cement paste, maximum diameter of aggregate and
the time. Was evaluated the applicability of the standard formulation to describe the
evolution of concrete with time, especially the formulations of NBR 6118:2003 and
CEB. The relationship shown between the elastic modulus of mortar and concrete,
according to the experimental data, is not linear, as is shown the relationship between
compression strength and modulus of elasticity. Based on this information, the
application of micromechanics modeling was assessed in two stages: without the
transition zone and with the presence of the transition zone, where effective properties

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Hardened Properties of Lime Based Mortars Produced from Kaolin Wastes
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Hardened Properties of Lime Based Mortars Produced from Kaolin Wastes

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Many studies have been developed about the use of wastes as construction materials. The
higher volume of waste generated by many types of industries has caused many Invironmental problems. Most of these wastes have not been placed in adequate sites, or even been reused. In Brazil the industries that produces kaolin generates a lot of wastes. Studies have been carried out on the use of kaolin wastes as replacement material for Portland cement concretes and mortars; and only few ones have studied it in hydraulic mortars for restoration of historical buildings. In this work kaolin wastes were studied as pozzolanic and inert material in lime mortars. Two lime/metakaolin ratios and different proportions of kaolin wastes as replacement of river sand were studied. Hardened properties of these mortars like compressive and tensile strength and water 
absorbed by capillarity were evaluated up to 180 days of curing. Microstructural characteristics also were assessed using thermal analysis (TG/DTG) and x-rays diffraction (XRD). Some mortars presented the highest strengths at 90 days of curing, and at 180 days their resistances dropped. The major phases found by microstructural analysis were monocarboaluminate (CAC H) and calcium carbonate (CaCO3).

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Microstructural characteristics of lime-pozzolan pastes made from kaolin production wastes

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Lime-pozzolan mortars are often used in restoration of historical buildings. In this paper pastes prepared with hydrated lime and metakaolin from kaolin production wastes were examined in order to verify the performance of this waste as a pozzolanic material in mixes containing hydrated lime. Some specimens were cured in moist air and some in dry air. The compositions and microstructures at curing times up to 180 d were assessed using thermal gravimetric analysis, X-ray diffraction and scanning electron microscopy. The major phases found in the lime-metakaolin pastes were strätlingite (C2ASH8), monocarboaluminate (C4A TeX H11), portlandite (CH) and calcite (C TeX ). The phases formed in these pastes were affected by curing conditions. In the moist cured samples the main phase was strätlingite and in the dry cured samples the main phase was monocarboaluminate. The portlandite was consumed by 28 d in moist curing and by 180 d in dry curing. SEM images showed that the morphology of lime-metakaolin pastes was influenced by curing condition and metakaolin content. In the moistured samples the morphologies of the main phases appeared very well formed with sharp edges, whereas in the dry cured samples the morphologies did not appear very well formed. This work shows that pastes using metakaolin made from kaolin production wastes had similar microstructural characteristics as have been reported for pastes made using commercial metakaolin. So this metakaolin is a suitable and environmentally friendly pozzolanic material for use in lime mortars.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Comportamento de concreto armado com adição de resíduos de tijolo cerâmico moído frente à corrosão por cloretos
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Behaviour of reinforced concretes with addition of ground clay bricks waste in relation to corrosion by chlorides

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
With the aim of analysing the behaviour of concrete with replacements of ground
clay bricks waste (GCBW) under reinforcement corrosion by chlorides, reinforced
concrete specimens with 80 x 80 x 80 mm were cast. The replacements were set at
0 %, 10 % and 30 % of cement weight and the water to cement ratio at 0.55. After
a 7-day wet curing and in a laboratory environment until the 180th day, the
specimens were subjected to wetting and drying cycles in a 1M sodium-chloride
solution. After identification of depassivation of the reinforcement, total and free
chloride profiles were obtained for each specimen. The results show that, although
there is a slight decrease in compressive strength and in critical chloride content
with GCBW addition to concrete, concretes with GCBW tend to show a reduction
in mass transport ability, which can override the previous aspect and extend the
initiation period of corrosion.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
With the aim of analysing the behaviour of concrete with replacements of ground
clay bricks waste (GCBW) under reinforcement corrosion by chlorides, reinforced

0 %, 10 % and 30 % of cement weight and the water to cement ratio at 0.55. After
